original_text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs, they see Jesus walking on the sea, and drawing nigh unto the ship: and they were afraid.
korean_text: 제자들이 노를 저어 십여 리쯤 가다가 예수께서 바다 위로 걸어 배에 가까이 오심을 보고 두려워하거늘

sentences.original_text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 이십오 내지 서희 규빙을 저어갔을 때

sentences.original_text: they see Jesus walking on the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 바다 위를 걷고 계신 예수를 보니

sentences.original_text: and drawing nigh unto the ship
